channel.title: Lumbridge
channel.description:
[CENTER] [font=verdana][size=24pt]Lumbridge[/size][/font]
Hello friends! I'm currently developing this server using Apollo as base. The server name is CURRENTLY Lumbridge because i don't have a name yet.. Server will be a pking/Eco server with minigames, Quests to complete and skills. I've lost my old source(https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530106.msg3870025.html#msg3870025) and quited rsps coding and made my own bot for RuneScape(which i won't advertise here) but now i'm back!
update log: [url=http://www.cmcmvj.tumblr.com]Tumblr - cmcmvj[/url]
Layout will be updated later! Progress: [COLOR=red]red: not started[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]orange: in development[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]green: done[/COLOR] [IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/64609429/Combat.png[/img][COLOR=Orange][size=12pt]Combat[/SIZE][IMG]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/64609429/Combat.png[/img][/COLOR]
[COLOR=Orange]Melee[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Special Attacks[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Bonuses[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Ranged[/COLOR] [COLOR=Green]Magic[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]PvP[/COLOR] [COLOR=Orange]PvN[/color]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img][b]Prayer:[/b][img]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] All prayers working
[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img][b][COLOR=Orange]Herblore[/color][/b]:[img]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img] [COLOR=green]Combat potions/prayer[/color] Potion making
[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img]Minigames:[img]http://i.imgur.com/uzR97.png[/img] [COLOR=Orange]Barrows[/color]
currently working on: Pvn & minigame!(our first minigame will be barrows brothers)
Pictures:
[url=http://www.cmcmvj.tumblr.com][size=18pt]Pictures: Tumblr[/size][/url]

item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

Keep the name lumbridge, makes the server seem more old school in my opinion. It keeps it more classic and simple which is what this server looks like or should be.

@cmcmvj wrote:


all combat spells are finished

edit:

Ranged is done, all weapons work like they should. Still working on cannon pictures on www.cmcmvj.tumblr.com

started on barrows.

item.title: Lumbridge
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:19, topic:438238”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=540957.msg3962616#msg3962616 date=1333413029]I never said I expected it to be perfect, just better before he would show it off. That’s what I would do, at least.
[/quote]
It’s an update log, not “showing off”. It’s a very simple concept.[/quote]
My apologies, I never read the topic.
Also, Java isn’t my strongest suit, I will admit, though I’ve been working with it [real programming, not RSPS] for about two and a half years. I’m fair at it.

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge
item.dc:creator: @g0d_of_war1 g0d of war1
item.description:
@g0d_of_war1 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:19, topic:438238”][quote author=Uncalled link=topic=540957.msg3962616#msg3962616 date=1333413029]I never said I expected it to be perfect, just better before he would show it off. That’s what I would do, at least.
[/quote]
It’s an update log, not “showing off”. It’s a very simple concept.

I don’t waste my life on RSPS, I rarely program them now. I waste my life on Java - something you wouldn’t know much about.

Who cares, even if he doesn’t know much about Java – it isn’t the end of his life. And you knowing a lot about Java isn’t the peak of yours. It honestly could not matter less – so stop debating.[/quote] this ^

Read full topic

item.title: Lumbridge
item.dc:creator: @g0d_of_war1 g0d of war1
item.description:
@g0d_of_war1 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:17, topic:438238”][quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=540957.msg3962603#msg3962603 date=1333412653]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=540957.msg3962572#msg3962572 date=1333411344]

[quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=540957.msg3962541#msg3962541 date=1333410494]

That’s some very shitty combat you have there.

'Tis alright. Apollo came with no combat base, I’m assuming he used the plugin that someone else had developed, and he is now building off of it.
[/quote]It’s not really alright. He can equip a whip and hit 4’s whilst the man hits 13’s. Now I’m not trashing his work, I’m just stating my opinion knowingly that it is in development.

And i’m pretty sure the Man doesn’t have 100 Hitpoints, and his hitpoints doesn’t even go down lol.

Ohmygod nowai? He must fail at writing combat…

Are you stupid? Have you EVER written combat from scratch yourself? It’s not just poof everything works. Try it sometime.
[/quote]I’ve written combat several times from scratch on Apollo and Hyperion.

So how the hell can you expect that he’ll have it perfect this early on?
[/quote]I never said I expected it to be perfect, just better before he would show it off. That’s what I would do, at least.

[quote author=g0d of war1 link=topic=540957.msg3962612#msg3962612 date=1333412799]

[quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=540957.msg3962603#msg3962603 date=1333412653]

[quote author=Uncalled link=topic=540957.msg3962572#msg3962572 date=1333411344]

[quote author=eyeownyew link=topic=540957.msg3962541#msg3962541 date=1333410494]

That’s some very shitty combat you have there.

'Tis alright. Apollo came with no combat base, I’m assuming he used the plugin that someone else had developed, and he is now building off of it.
[/quote]It’s not really alright. He can equip a whip and hit 4’s whilst the man hits 13’s. Now I’m not trashing his work, I’m just stating my opinion knowingly that it is in development.

And i’m pretty sure the Man doesn’t have 100 Hitpoints, and his hitpoints doesn’t even go down lol.

Ohmygod nowai? He must fail at writing combat…

Are you stupid? Have you EVER written combat from scratch yourself? It’s not just poof everything works. Try it sometime.
[/quote]I’ve written combat several times from scratch on Apollo and Hyperion.

So how the hell can you expect that he’ll have it perfect this early on?
[/quote] ^ As i said uncalled think he so perfect so, he judges other people. Do me a favour uncalled, stop wasting your life on rsps, and go back to school. You retard
[/quote]I don’t waste my life on RSPS, I rarely program them now. I waste my life on Java - something you wouldn’t know much about.[/quote] Lol stop commenting on this topic. If you still want to argue like a little kid, inbox me then. If not gtfo
